content:
ITEM NO.20               COURT NO.11               SECTION II-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Petition(s) for Special Leave to Appeal (Crl.)  No(s).  9559/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  20-06-2025
in CRMP No. 3356/2024 passed by the High Court of Jharkhand at
Ranchi]
MANOJ KUMAR SINHA                                  Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
THE STATE OF JHARKHAND & ANR.                      Respondent(s)
FOR ADMISSION and I.R. 
IA No. 152094/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING C/C OF THE IMPUGNED 
JUDGMENT, IA No. 152096/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE SUDHANSHU DHULIA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE JOYMALYA BAGCHI
(PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH) 
For Petitioner(s) :Mr. Sidharth Luthra, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Shubhashis Rasik Soren, Adv.
                   Mr. Manish Paliwal, AOR
                   Mr. Kushagra Raghuvanshi, Adv.
                   Mrs. Trupti Das, Adv.                           
For Respondent(s) : 
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Issue notice, returnable on 28.07.2025. 
Till the next date of hearing, the effect and operation 
of the order dated 20.06.2025 passed by the High Court of 
Jharkhand at Ranchi in Cr. M.P. No. 3356/2024 shall remain 
stayed.
In  the  meanwhile,  the  petitioner  is  exempted  from  
surrendering.
We make it clear that the victim/complainant shall also 
be examined as early as possible. 
(NEETU SACHDEVA)                                (RENU BALA GAMBHIR)
ASTT. REGISTRAR-cum-PS                        ASSISTANT  REGISTRAR
